member.name: T:EventSlice.Dispatcher
member.summary: The dispatcher maintains a thread-safe queue of events. When a new event arrives, the event is dispatched to any registered Modules. Any registered module may also enqueue a RealTimeEvent for distribution.

member.name: T:EventSlice.Interfaces.Module
member.summary: This class contains the specification all classes wishing to participate in the event system must implement.

member.name: N:EventSlice
member.summary: Contains the system for dispatching events to/from modules.

member.name: N:EventSlice.Interfaces
member.summary: Abstract classes and interfaces related to the event subsystem.

member.name: N:ReceiverSlice
member.summary: Contains the software needed to communicate with the VEMCO hardware via serial port.

member.name: N:SerialPortSlice
member.summary: Manages the serial ports on the server.

member.name: N:SerialPortSlice.RealTimeEvents
member.summary: Events generated by the serial port manager.
